review: Chromecast does not want to work with a Verizon FIOS router connected to my desktop. The support site that Google provides for Chromecast is not helpful either.  I should be able to wirelessly connect a desktop to a large screen TV, but it does not work as advertised.

review: Wish there was a manual way to control the stream quality (1080p vs 720p). I have a old tv with vga in that is only 720p. Bought this & 3 different HDM-to-VGA adapters, but would not work as adapters tell Chromecast (CC) they can handle both 1080p & 720p streams, so CC chooses the best, ie 1080p to stream & my old TV just shows blank. Works great in my 1080p tv though. Wish CC will address this issue in the future by letting u select the stream quality manually under CC settings.
